Text:

This does NOT works.

Windows Update can't check for updates because the service is not running....
@dr_who1 how about you open services.msc as admin and look for "Windows Update" .. if the service is not running click in start. I can assure you your problem is not related to the patch

I tried again, it worked this time.
Still don't think this is the "real deal".
@dr_who1 I agree with you.. it's just a temporary solution for people (like me) who couldn't activate win after the russian kms server got closed :)
It works. It only removes Watermark and Activation Notification but it does not activate the windows 8 thanks for the upload Izuael let's wait for the activator! greetings friends

that windows "activator" does not work, it only "works" for a dew days, I know because I had it before. I think it "worked" for me for 2-3 days without the blue screen asking me to ACTIVATE windows. 

I still have that annoying blue screen.
